name: dasu
description: Consistent xhr API for both client and server (http.request)

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:js:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && tape test/*test*.js | faucet && npm run passlint
